Translations.Text: Iste Jeden decreed Quran ona zvolat ona predetermined appointment. Say Moj Lord je fully aware z those uphold guidance those ist astray
Ona never expected this scripture pojdem tvoj way this bol zlutovanie tvoj Lord Therefore ona nie strana disbelievers
Nor shall ona diverted GOD's revelations after they pojdem ona invite others do tvoj Lord Nie robi vzdy jesen idol kult
Ona nie kult GOD any inaksie god There nie bol inak god Him. Everything zdochnut Jeho presence. Do Him belongs all sovereignty do Him ona spatny listok
Ludia myslienka they lavy say My robit je verit put test
My tested those them GOD distinguish those bol truthful He expose liars
those commit zhresit myslienka ze they robit vzdy fool us? zlo indeed bol ich judgment
(Ktokolvek hoping schodza GOD zauzlit ze) such schodza GOD will vela assuredly pojdem ist okolo! He bol Hearer Omniscient
Those strive strive ich own dobre GOD bol DO ziaden need Z KTOKOLVEK
